mapper.select:
SELECT T.*, REQ_QTY - ORDRG_QTY AS REMAIN_QTY FROM ( SELECT A.CO_CD , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.REQ_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') REQ_DT , A.REQ_SEQ , (SELECT PRJCT_NM FROM TB_SD05M01 WHERE PRJCT_CD = A.PRJCT_CD) AS PRJCT_NM , A.PRJCT_CD , A.SITE_CD , (SELECT SITE_NM FROM TB_SD09M01 WHERE SITE_CD = A.SITE_CD) AS SITE_NM , A.WH_CD , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.WH_CD) WH_NM , A.TYP_CD , A.IMP_YN , A.DLVR_DTTM , A.REQ_RMK , A.TOT_QTY , A.TOT_WT , A.REQ_MNG_ID , A.ORDRG_YN , A.RECPT_YN , B.ORDRG_SEQ , A.REQ_CREAT_DIV , SUM(B.REQ_QTY) REQ_QTY , (SELECT SUM(REAL_DLVR_QTY) FROM TB_OD01D01 OD01D01 WHERE OD01D01.ORDRG_SEQ = B.ORDRG_SEQ) ORDRG_QTY FROM TB_OD02M01 A , TB_OD02D01 B WHERE A.REQ_SEQ = B.REQ_SEQ AND A.ORDRG_YN = 'N'
AND A.CO_CD = #{coCd1}
AND B.PRDT_DIV IN (SELECT DISTINCT PRDT_DIV FROM TB_BM01M01 WHERE PRDT_GRP = #{prdtGrp1} )
GROUP BY A.CO_CD , A.REQ_DT , A.REQ_SEQ , A.PRJCT_CD , A.SITE_CD , A.WH_CD , A.TYP_CD , A.IMP_YN , A.DLVR_DTTM , A.REQ_RMK , A.TOT_QTY , A.TOT_WT , A.REQ_MNG_ID , A.ORDRG_YN , B.ORDRG_SEQ , A.RECPT_YN , A.REQ_CREAT_DIV ORDER BY REQ_DT, REQ_SEQ ) T

SELECT A.BILG_CERT_NO, A.CO_CD, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.CO_CD) AS CO_NM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.SELL_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') SELL_DT, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.SELPCH_CD) SELPCH_NM, A.SELPCH_CD, A.CLNT_CD, A.CLNT_NM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.TAX_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') TAX_DT, A.TAX_BILG_NO, A.TAX_DMS5_7240, A.TAX_MOA5_23, A.TAX_MOA5_124, A.TAX_MOA5_388, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.RFF_CNO) RFF_CNO, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.RFF_VA) RFF_VA, A.TAX_DIV_CD, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.TAX_DIV_CD) TAX_DIV_NM, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.RFF_GN1) RFF_GN1, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.RFF_GN2) RFF_GN2, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.RFF_AEA) RFF_AEA, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.BGM_1225) BGM_1225, (SELECT CODE_ETC FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_ID = A.RFF_GN1) RFF_GN1_CD, (SELECT CODE_ETC FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_ID = A.RFF_GN2) RFF_GN2_CD, (SELECT CODE_ETC FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_ID = A.RFF_AEA) RFF_AEA_CD, A.BGM_1225 BGM_1225_CD, A.BGM_4343, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.XML_FLOW) XML_FLOW, A.TAX_CREAT_ID, A.TAX_CREAT_NM, A.TAXIVC_COPRT, A.TAXIVC_COPRT_NO, A.TAXIVC_COPRT_CEO, A.TAXIVC_COPRT_NM, A.TAX_COPRT_BIZCON, A.TAXVIC_COPRT_BSTY, A.CTAII_MD_2, A.COMII_AL, A.COMII_EM, A.COMII_TE, A.COMII_FX, A.CTAIV_BJ_1, A.TAXIVC_RCV_CRN, A.TAXIVC_RCV_CEO, A.TAXIVC_RCV_ADDR, A.TAXIVC_RCV_BIZCON, A.TAXIVC_RCV_BSTY, A.TAX_RCV_SN, A.TAX_RCV_NM, A.TAX_RCV_EMAIL, A.TAX_RCV_EMAIL2, A.TAX_RCV_FAX, A.TAX_RCV_TEL, A.TAX_MOBLPHON, A.FTXAC1_1, A.FTXAC2_1, A.FTXAC3_1, A.TAX_MOA5_22, A.TAX_MOA5_212, A.TAX_MOA5_308, A.TAX_MOA5_9, A.TRST_QTY, A.TRST_WT, A.TRST_UPR, A.TRST_AMT, A.REAL_TRST_QTY, A.REAL_TRST_WT, A.REAL_TRST_UPR, A.REAL_TRST_AMT, A.BILG_QTY, A.BILG_WT, A.BILG_UPR, A.BILG_AMT, A.TRANS_AMT, A.TRST_DC_AMT, A.ETC_AMT, A.SND_YN, DECODE(A.SND_YN, 'Y', A.SND_YN, 'N', DECODE(A.CSEQ_RCV_YN, 'Y', A.CSEQ_RCV_YN, 'N', 'N', NULL, 'N'), NULL, DECODE(A.CSEQ_RCV_YN, 'Y', A.CSEQ_RCV_YN, 'N', 'N', NULL, 'N')) AS SND_CHECK, TO_CHAR(A.SND_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') SND_DTTM, A.SND_PROC_ID, A.CSEQ_RCV_YN, TO_CHAR(A.CSEQ_RCV_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CSEQ_RCV_DTTM, A.TAX_ADMS_YN, TO_CHAR(A.TAX_ADMS_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') TAX_ADMS_DTTM, DECODE(CSEQ_RCV_YN, 'E', 'N', DECODE(A.SND_YN, 'Y', A.SND_YN, 'N', DECODE(A.CSEQ_RCV_YN, 'Y', A.CSEQ_RCV_YN, 'N', 'N', NULL, 'N'), NULL, DECODE(A.CSEQ_RCV_YN, 'Y', A.CSEQ_RCV_YN, 'N', 'N', NULL, 'N'))) AS RCV_YN,
TO_CHAR(A.RCV_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') RCV_DTTM, A.RCV_PROC_ID, A.ACC_SLIP_NO, A.ACC_SLIP_YN, TO_CHAR(A.ACC_SLIP_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ACC_SLIP_DTTM, A.ACC_PROC_ID, A.ETC_FIELD1, A.ETC_FIELD2, A.ETC_FIELD3, A.ORGN_TAX_BILG_NO, A.INV_SND_YN FROM TB_AR04M01 A WHERE A.SELPCH_CD = 'SELPCH2'
AND A.CO_CD = #{coCd}
AND DECODE(CSEQ_RCV_YN, 'E', 'N', DECODE(A.SND_YN, 'Y', A.SND_YN, 'N', DECODE(A.CSEQ_RCV_YN, 'Y', A.CSEQ_RCV_YN, 'N', 'N', NULL, 'N'), NULL, DECODE(A.CSEQ_RCV_YN, 'Y', A.CSEQ_RCV_YN, 'N', 'N', NULL, 'N'))) = 'N'
ORDER BY SELL_DT DESC, ORGN_TAX_BILG_NO, TAX_BILG_NO, BILG_CERT_NO DESC
